item.description:
The Barefoot Runners Society MA Chapter is pleased to host the 3rd International Barefoot Runners Day.

This yearly celebration will include:

1) 10 AM - 11AM FREE barefoot running workshops for beginners and intermediate.

2) 11AM - 11:45 Fun Run with a choice of 1 mile OR a 3.1 mile fun run around Lake Quannapowitt with an experienced lead.

3) 12PM - 1PM Bring your own lunch social.

Let's meetup, hang out  and enjoy running.

Park on Main Street at the base of Wave Avenue perpendicular to Main Street with a GPS address in the 220's Main Street.

We plan to meet on the grounds of Lake Quannapowitt across from Wave Avenue. At the base of both streets across the street on the Lake side on the grass just off the sidewalk.

IBRD T Shirts and more information is available on The Barefoot Runners Society Website:

http://www.thebarefootrunners.org/pages/IBRD/
item.how_to_find_us: At the Base of Wave Avenue + Main Street on the graas field.
item.name: International Barefoot Running Day (IBRD), Wakefield, MA
